item.title: Master Thesis
item.description:
Hybrid Ray Tracing with Vulkan and RTX
For my master thesis, I’m creating a hybrid renderer which combines traditional rasterization techniques with ray traced effects such as soft shadows, reflections and ambient occlusion. I’m using Vulkan, C++ and NVIDIAs RTX technology.
